1.content:
You and your father are having dinner at Joanne's house with her and her daughters. You've been having these 'family' meals once a week for the past few months. You guess your father is trying to get you used to the idea that he and Joanne are a couple.

"Stephen and I have an announcement." Joanne says once everyone is finished eating.

"I've asked Joanne to marry me." your father says.

"And I accepted." Joanne shows everyone her new diamond ring.

"What?" you ask. "You mean we are all going to live together?"

"Yes." he says. "After the wedding."

"Where?" you ask. "We only have 2 bedrooms at home."

"Here." Joanne says. "Lisa can move into Susan's room."

"Mom!" Susan complains. "She's still in diapers."

"Shh." Joanne says. "It'll only be until we find a bigger place."

"When is the wedding?" Susan asks, moving the subject back to something she can get excited about.

"In a couple of months." your father says. "It's only going to be a small thing."

"Can I help you choose a dress?" Susan asks Joanne is drawn off into excited chatter with her daughters about the details of the big day.
1.title: Announcement

"Cool!" Susan claps excitedly then rushes to a rack of dresses. "This one." She pulls out red dress with a long skirt and puffy sleeves.

"Why do they put the zip at the back?" You ask trying to reach behind yourself.

"So it doesn't ruin the front of the dress." she calls back through the curtain.

"Well how do girls dress themselves?" you ask, still having no success.

"It takes practice." she tells you, stepping into the small room with you. "Here let me help."

"Hey!" you complain. "It's meant to be private in her.

"We're both girls." she says with a giggle as she turns you around and pulls the zip up. Then she pulls you out of the room. "Come on. Let's see how it looks."

You let her lead you out and up to a full-length mirror. "It suits you." She says. "You make quite a good looking girl. It's a good thing you wear your hair a little long."

You stare at your reflection in disbelief. You really do look like a girl. Although not a very well developed one.

"Except you're a little flat chested." she observes the same thing.

"What's going on?" Joanne walks over with Lisa and sees you modelling the dress.

"Brett wants to be a bridesmaid too." Susan tells her.

It took some convincing but you agreed to go to the salon where you learned the beautician, Jane Smith there had been doing Joanne's hair for years. "Hey, Jo." Smiling, she said. "Are you here to get ready for the wedding?" She turned to you. "I thought you said your fiancee had a son."

"She does but he has a special problem." With a sad face, Joanne replied. "We're hoping a new look will help him."

Jane became concerned especially since you began to tear up. "What sort of problem?" Looking at you, she asked. "Nothing serious, I hope..."

Joanne retold your story to Jane then added, "We suggested he try being a girl for a while and see where it goes."

"After all he had gone through after that tragedy, he deserves to feel pretty." Jumping in, Susan said. "We're hoping you and your team can work your magic and show him how beautiful 'she' can be."

Jane stepped forward before giving you a warm hug that made you blush. "Oh, you poor little thing!" Sadly, she said. "The nightmare you must have lived through!" She released you but then gripped your hand. "Come, I will bring out your inner beauty."

At this point, it was useless to argue so you allowed to be put into a chair and Jane got to work with her entire team. As everyone gathered the needed equipment, Jane placed a hair cape over the mirror in front of you. "I want the final results to be a surprise so you have something to look forward to." Smiling, she said. "We are going to make you breathtaking."

With that, the work began with a relaxing shampoo and massage of your hair and scalp before came the blow-drying and trimming. You could not help doze off as they worked so gently. You were snapped out of your dozed state when they announced they were done. Looking at the mirror, you jaw dropped in shock at your reflection. "What did they do to me...?!"

The delicate layers of makeup gave your face an angel like glow which oddly matched your near doll like features. The small shimmering diamonds clipped to your ears and the light shade of soft pink on your lips greatly enhanced the effect. The bright red color on your fingernails went well with the red cloth belt of your jeans. The long, flowing southern belle hairstyle they had given you completed the look. As you gazed at your reflection, you did not see yourself but a beautiful teenage girl that would certainly turn a lot of boys' heads at school.

"Is that... me?" Almost whispering, you asked.

"That is most certainly you." With a hint of pride, Jane said. "Do you like it?"

You were still gazing at your reflection when you whispered...

1111111121312.content:
You winced before saying, "I feel a little under dressed."

Joanne and Susan were silent for a moment before they let out a laugh. "Well, you do have a point." Bemused, Jane said. "There is a dress shop right next door. Maybe you can find one that speaks out to you."

Before I knew it, I was being escorted by Joanne, Susan, and the workers of the salon to the dress store next door where a sales lady approached us and was given the same story of my discomfort along with their plan to make me feel better. the saleslady gave me the same look of pity before knotting her jaws in decision.

"My son is in transition to become my daughter." Serious, she said. "I know all to well the teasing and bullying that comes with that." She placed a comforting hand onto my shoulder. "Come, darling... I will show you fashions that will make you the envy of high school divas!"

With that, I was pulled from a rack of skirts to a rack of dresses to a rack of lingerie. Again and again, I was pushed into the changing room to try on item after item, each one being put into the cart. Within an hour, there was a small wardrobe of girl's clothing in the cart to be purchased. Susan winced, hearing me moan slightly and turned to her.

"I think we have enough for now, mom." Wincing, she said. "Besides, we haven't let Britt pick out a single outfit for her- err- himself."

Joanne paused then turned to you as if she had woke up from a dream. There was a look of concern on her face. "You're right." Guilt in her voice, she said. "I guess we got carried away a little."

"Are we almost done?" Hiding tears, I asked. "I- I can't afford all of this..."

Joanne giggled. "You don't have to worry about that, sweetie." Cooing, she said. "This is all on me." She paused to push a lock of my now curly hair away from my eyes. "What do you say, getting you into a nice skirt and blouse set and go out for lunch together."

You sighed at that. "It sounds wonderful."

"Susan I asked Brett, not you." Joanne's attention shifted back towards you but also took note of how red your face was from Susan comment, "Is that true?" She asked, "You better not lie to me Brett or you will not enjoy the punishment."
122112221222.title: No

choices: "I'll keep your secret since you're family now"
"I wont tell anyone but I want to be in charge of your diapers and changes"
122112222.content:
"Susan I was wearing the diaper because i've started to wet myself slightly once in a while without noticing. Please dont tell anyone."
Susan thinks for a moment and says
122112222.title: I started  wetting myself sligthly  once in a w...

1221122222.content:
"Well Brett I am not totally convinced that you could hide such a problem for that pretty long time, but given that you didn't had a maternal figure in your life, which you could have helped you with, it seems only logical that were so afraid of disappointing your father, your only choice was to prevent him from finding it out.

But don't worry Brett while I personally think that least Mom should know about your condition since a doctor should make sure that it doesn't becomes worse but I won't tell her unless you ask me to do so."

By now you calmed down a bit and ask nervously
"Susan do you promise not to tell anyone, even if I and off course that is only rhetorical I wasn't completely honest to you about the reason why I am wearing one of Lisa's diaper's before?"

"Brett I said I will keep this whole situation strictly confidential, and I meant it! I don't have to know why exactly you are standing in front of me only wearing my little sister's diaper. All I need to know is if you need them or not, because if you don't we can just pretend that this situation never happened.

But if you really need them I would need to take charge of that little problem of your since you clearly can't handle that properly, which the totally unexpired put-on diaper between your legs proves. Just look at the leak guards, they aren't at the right places at all, so the diaper will leak the second you use. And now please answer my question completely honestly, if you do so you have nothing to fear but if lie to me and I will ever discover the truth, you will deeply regret it!"

After carefully considering all pros and cons and possible risks you decide to
1221122222.title: "I wont tell anyone but I want to be in cha...

choices: Tell Joanne that she left Lisa's diapers in your room
12212.content:
You dismiss the idea as stupid and start unpacking.

Soon, you hear a knock "Brett?" Susan asks from the other side of the door. "Are you awake? Mom's making breakfast."

"Thanks" you say. "I'm coming."'

You stop unpacking and join the rest of your, now larger, family for breakfast.
12212.title: Leave the diapers

122121.content:
"I think you forgot to move some of Lisa's diapers when you moved her stuff into Susan's room." you tell Joanne.

"I thought I was missing a box." she says. "Thanks for letting me know."

"Do you want me to move them?" you offer.

"No. Don't worry about it." she says. "I'll take care of it."

That evening you find that the diapers are still in your wardrobe.
122121.title: Tell Joanne that she left Lisa's diapers in...

choices: Wake up wet and start crying
1221212.content:
The next morning...



"Hey sweetie, you kind of wet the bed...." says Joanne as she comes in. "So, we're going to try something new. We'll put you in diapers at night, okay?" "I will not wear diapers!" you say. "Sweetie, you don't have a choice. I don't want to keep washing the sheets" says Joanne.

You agree, reluclantly. You get out of bed and walk downstairs. You see a glass of milk and drink it. You put the glass in the sink. Joanne comes down with your sheets, and asks "Did you see a milk bottle? It was for Lisa. She's not pooping so I spiked it with laxatives." You don't put two and two together and say no. The all of a sudden a big burst of pee comes out. Joannes notices the dark spot on your pants. "Go wash up..." she says.

You wash up and hear Joanne calling you. You walk over to her but she's in Lisa's room. "Brett, I know you've been having difficulty getting to the toilet so we're going to put you back into diapers during the day as well. We just started potty training Lisa but we'll try to potty train you as well. It's just difficult potty training two babies." says Joanne. "I'm not a baby!" you say angrily. "I know this is tough. If you need to go potty, tell an adult and we'll take you to your special potty" says Joanne. She leaves

Later that morning, you have to go pee, so you tell Joanne. "Aww, the baby is going to go potty!" she says. She takes you into the bathroom. You look at her to leave. She says "I'm gonna have to watch you go pee, since we're potty training you". You are about to sit on the toilet when she says "You need to practice on a baby potty first, silly!" She bring out a pink toddler potty. "This is the only potty we have, sorry" she says. You piss in the potty and she says "Good Job!" and you realize she was taking a video! She picks you up and carries you to the changing table. She grabs a diaper and says "I went shopping but they were sold out of boy diapers", as she pulls out a Rapunzel diaper, and one with flowers. You choose the Rapunzel one.

She tapes it on and puts you in Lisa's crib. "Why am I in Lisa's crib?" you ask. She says "Well, you need a nap, so your father, Stephen took her to the park to take a nap". She says "Oh, I almost forgot! Your milk!" She goes downstair to get some formula but there's none left. She comes back up and says "There's no more formula," while she grabs you from the crib and takes you to the rocking chair and start figeting with her bra. It comes off and she puts the tip in your mouth. You instinctively start sucking and it tastes suprisingly good. A couple minutes in and you're fast asleep. She gently puts you in the crib and turns off the lights and closes the door.
1221212.title: Leave them

122122.content:
You don't bring up the diapers. You don't want to admit it to yourself but this is probably because a small part of you still hasn't given up the idea of trying one on.

"Hey." Susan says as you finish breakfast. "If you like I could show you around the neighborhood today and introduce you to some of my friends."
122122.title: Don't mention the diapers

1222.content:
Most of your clothes are still packed in suitcases but it can wait. You walk out to the living room where you find Susan and Lisa watching TV.

"Good morning Bro." Susan greets you.

"Good Morning" you say, rolling your eyes at her calling you 'bro' as you sit down.

"Hey." she says. "If you like I could show you around the neighborhood today and introduce you to some of my friends."
1222.title: Go to the living room and see if anyone else is...

choices: Ask Amy to come back to your place
12221.content:
"Thanks" you accept. "That would be good."

After breakfast you have a shower and get dressed.

"Ready?" Susan asks.

"Yep." you say. "Let's go."

She leads you out into the neighborhood. "Let's see if anyone is hanging out at the park." she suggests.

She takes you to a nearby park. Two of her friends are already there, sitting on the swings.

She waves. "Hi Amy. Hi Jane"

The girls wave back and call out. "Hi Susan."

"This is Brett." Susan introduces you when you reach the swings. "He's my stepbrother."

"Hi Brett." one of the girls greets you. "I'm Amy."

"And I'm Jane." the other one introduces herself.

You stay at the park chatting with the girls for a while. Amy is really nice and you think she looks quite attractive. You start to wonder if she'd go out with you.

"It's almost time for lunch." Susan observes after a couple of hours. "We'd better get back."

"You could come to my place for lunch." Amy suggests.

"I Can't." Susan says. "I promised to help Mom make lunch. But Brett can go."
12221.title: Accept the offer

122211.content:
"Okay." you agree.

"What about you Jane" Amy asks.

"Sorry." Jane says. "I've got to get home."

So everyone says goodbye and you follow Amy back to her house. It's exciting but also a little scary to be left alone with her.

You have lunch with Amy's family then she takes you to her bedroom.

"Won't your parents be worried about me being in here with you?" you ask nervously.

"You're not going to try anything are you?" she asks with a giggle.

"No." you shake your head.

"Then they've got nothing to worry about." she says.

"What do you want to do?" you ask.

"We could play truth or dare." she suggests.

"Just the two of us?" you ask.

"Yeah." she says. "Are you afraid?"
122211.title: Go with Amy

1222112.content:
"Well Amy, you are a nice person and I think I like you, I just don't want to give up the chance that you might go out with me, after we had time to get to know each other better, by embarrassing myself in front of you." you reponse nervously.

"Well Brett, I will make you an offer. I need to know that you are serious, before I can agree to going out with you. There are two possibilities for you to show me that, the first is that you fullfil a dare for me now, the second option is that you try to win my heart slowly over time."Amy suggests.
1222112.title: Say you don't want to

122212.content:
"Why don't you come with us?" you suggest to Amy. "You too Jane. I'm sure Joanne's mom won't mind."

"Okay." Amy agrees.

"Sorry. I've got to get home." Jane says. "I'll see you at school tomorrow."

The rest of you say goodbye to Jane and head home.

"I'll go help Mom." Susan says, leaving you in the living room with Amy. Lisa is also here, watching some TV show for little kids.
122212.title: Ask Amy to come back to your place

"Thanks." you say. "But I'll be fine exploring by myself. I'm sure you want to hang out with your friends without me tagging along."

"Suit yourself." she seems a little disappointed.

After breakfast you have a shower and get dressed then wonder what you'll do with the say.

You find a large oval. There's a group of boys, about your age, playing soccer.

You can't be bothered doing much today so you throw yourself on the sofa and start clicking through the channels.

Lisa comes in holding two dolls. "Wanna play?" she asks.

info.brief_description: Your new stepmother has a strange way of making you feel like one of her children
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are Brett Gibson, a teenage boy.

It's just been you and your father, Stephen, for years but now he's met someone and they're getting married.

His fiancee Joanne Clark has two daughter named Susan and Lisa. Susan is about your age and Lisa is almost 3. You don't dislike them but you also don't see them as your family and aren't comfortable with the idea of all four of you moving in together.

Joanne has a plan to help you accept her as your mother. Unfortunately for you that plan starts with treating you like a baby.
